select: select id as "news_id", to_char(coalesce(day,current_date),'dd-mm-yyyy') as "day", caption "caption", sDescr "sDescr", image "image" from News N order by id desc limit 10
select to_char(coalesce(day,current_date),'dd-mm-yyyy'), caption, sDescr, image, Descr from dual left outer join News N on N.id=${news_id}

select I.id "item_id", cast(R.price as numeric(12,2)) as "price", I.code "code", I.Name ||' '|| coalesce(R.Remark,'') "sDescr", 'imgi/Image?item_id='||I.id "image" from DocRow R left outer join Item I on I.id=R.item_id where I.id is not null and R.doc_id in ( select DS.doc_id from DocStates DS where DS.n=0 and state_id = 21 limit 10) limit 10

select lev "lev", I.code "code", I.Name "name", cast(I.pricePro as numeric(12,2)) "price1", cast( GetPrice( I.id) as numeric(12,2)) "price", case when GetQuant(I.id)>10 then '>10' else GetQuant(I.id)||'' end as "q", GetQuant(I.id,2) as "qR", GetQuant(I.id,4) as "qI", I.id as "item_id", A.dop as "dop", I.isImage "isImage", case when I.flag in (1,2,3, 5,6,7) and GetQuant(I.id)>0 then 1 else 0 end "isAction" from AnalogTemp A left outer join Item I on A.item_id=I.id left outer join Item I1 on A.item_id0=I1.id left outer join Valuta V on V.id=I.val_id where lev!=0 and (#{isQ}=0 or coalesce(GetQuant(I.id),0)>0 or coalesce(GetQuant(I.id,4),0)>0 ) and not exists(select id from Producent P where P.id=I.prod_id and (P.flag &1)=1 ) and not exists(select id from Producent P where P.id=I1.prod_id and (P.flag & 1)=1 ) order by A.dop,A.lev,I.code

select max(D.num) "num", to_char(max(D.day),'dd-mm-yyyy') "day", count(R.item_id) "n", cast( sum(GetPrice(R.item_id)*R.quant) as numeric(12,2)) "sum" from Doc1 D left outer join DocRow1 R on R.doc_id=D.id where D.id=cast(#{doc_id} as integer) group by D.id
update: insert into webSearch(klient_id,nodeAddress,str,sstr,isCode,item_id,prod_id, prog_id ) values( cast( #{klient_id} as integer),#{adres},lower(#{search}),lower(REPLACE(#{search},' ','') ),#{isCode}, cast(#{item_id} as integer),cast(#{prod_id} as integer), 2)
select:
select P.id as "id", P.name as "name", P.description "descr", 0 as "cnt" from Producent P where P.id = cast(#{prod_id} as smallint)
select I.prod_id "id", max(P.name) "name", coalesce(max(P.description),min(I.name) ) "descr", count(*) "cnt" from Item I left outer join Producent P on P.id=I.prod_id and coalesce( P.flag & 1,0)=0 where P.id is not null and coalesce( I.sign & 2,0)=0
and I.scode like '${scode}%'
and to_tsvector('english',I.code||' '||I.name) @@ to_tsquery('${n}:*')
and 1!=1
and GetQuant(I.id)>0
group by I.prod_id
order by 2 limit 15

select I.code as "code", I.Name as "name", I.price as "price", I.price1 as "price1", I.id "item_id", case when I.flag in (1,2,3,5,6,7) and q>0 then 1 end "status", case when q>10 then '>10' else q||'' end as "q", qR as "qR", qI as "qI", case when qV>10 then '>10' else qV || '' end as "qV", I.isImage "isImage", I.prod_id as "prod_id" from (select I.id, I.code, I.Name, cast( GetPrice(I.id) as numeric(12,2)) as price, cast(I.pricePro as numeric(12,2)) as price1, (select sum(case when S.kind=1 then S.quant when S.kind=2 then -S.quant end) from Store S join placeSel PS on PS.place_id=S.SubConto_id where S.kind in (1,2) and S.item_id=I.id and S.SubConto_id not in (select SubConto_id from SubContoTypes TS where TS.SubContoType_id=17) ) as q, (select sum(case when S.kind=1 then S.quant when S.kind=2 then -S.quant end) from Store S join placeSel PS on PS.place_id=S.SubConto_id where S.kind in (1,2) and S.item_id=I.id and S.SubConto_id in (select SubConto_id from SubContoTypes TS where TS.SubContoType_id=17) ) as qV, (select sum(S.quant) from Store S join placeSel PS on PS.place_id=S.SubConto_id where S.kind in (2) and S.item_id=I.id and S.SubConto_id not in (select SubConto_id from SubContoTypes TS where TS.SubContoType_id=17) ) as qR, (select sum(S.quant) from Store S join placeSel PS on PS.place_id=S.SubConto_id where S.kind in (4) and S.item_id=I.id and S.SubConto_id not in (select SubConto_id from SubContoTypes TS where TS.SubContoType_id=17) ) as qI, I.isImage, I.prod_id, I.flag from Item I left outer join Valuta V on V.id=I.val_id where 1=1
and I.scode like '${scode}%'
and to_tsvector('english',I.code||' '||I.name) @@ to_tsquery('${n}:*')
and 1!=1
and I.prod_id = cast(#{prod_id} as smallint)
) I where 1=1
and (q>0 or qV>0)
order by case when lower(I.code) like lower('${code}%') then 0 else 1 end
limit 21

and I.name like lower('%${n}%')
select I.code as "code", I.Name as "name", GetPrice(I.id) as "price", cast(I.pricePro as numeric(12,2)) as "price1", I.id "item_id", case when I.flag in (1,2,3) then 1 end "status", case when GetQuant(I.id)>10 then '>10' else GetQuant(I.id)||'' end as "q", GetQuant(I.id,2) as "qR", GetQuant(I.id,4) as "qI", I.isImage "isImage", I.prod_id as "prod_id" from Item I where I.id is not null and coalesce( bitand(I.sign,2),0)=0
and I.scode like lcase('${scode}%')
and sname like lcase('%${n}%')
and 1!=1
and I.prod_id = #{prod_id}
and GetQuant(I.id)>0
order by case when lcase(I.code) like lcase('${code}%') then 0 else 1 end
limit 21

select D.num as "num", to_char(D.day,'dd-mm-yyyy') as "day", R.item_id as "item_id", I.code "code", I.Name "name", GetPrice(I.id) as "price", cast(I.pricePro as numeric(12,2)) as "price1", cast(R.quant as integer) "quant", case when GetQ(I.id,1,0)>10 then '>10' else GetQ(I.id,1,0)||'' end as "q", GetQ(I.id,2,0) as "qR", GetQ(I.id,4,0) as "qI", GetQ(I.id,1,1) as "qV", cast(R.quant*GetPrice(I.id) as numeric(12,2)) "sum", D.KindDoc_id from Doc1 D left outer join Doc D1 on D1.id1=D.id and D1.KindDoc_id in (10,16,40) left outer join DocRow1 R on R.doc_id=coalesce(D1.id,D.id) left outer join Item I on I.id=R.item_id where D.id=cast(#{doc_id} as integer)

select * from (select KD.Name "docName", D.Num "num", to_char(D.Day,'dd-mm-yyyy') "day", case when D.sDay < current_date then 'style="color:red"' else '' end as "clr", coalesce(to_char(D.sDay,'dd-mm-yyyy'),'') "sday", cast(case when coalesce(D.val_id,0)!=978 then case when D.KindDoc_id in (3,27,20,28) then D.sum else -D.sum end end as numeric(12,2)) as "s", cast(case when coalesce(D.val_id,0)!=978 then case when D.KindDoc_id in (3,27,20,28) then D.sum-coalesce(D.osum,0) else -D.osum end end as numeric(12,2)) as "os", cast(case when coalesce(D.val_id,0)=978 then case when D.KindDoc_id in (3,27,20,28) then D.vsum else -D.vsum end end as numeric(12,2)) as "vs", cast(case when coalesce(D.val_id,0)=978 then case when D.KindDoc_id in (3,27,20,28) then D.vsum-coalesce(D.vosum,0) else -D.vosum end end as numeric(12,2)) as "vos", D.id "doc_id", D.SubConto_id from DocOpen O left outer join Doc D on D.id=O.doc_id join KindDoc KD on KD.id=D.KindDoc_id where O.SubConto_id=cast(${klient_id} as numeric(12,2)) ) T where "os"!=0 or "vos"!=0 order by "day","num"

select to_char(D.Day,'dd-mm-yyyy') "day", D.Num "num", coalesce(cast(D.sum as numeric(12,2)) ||'','') "sum", coalesce(D.Remark,'') "remark", coalesce(DS.Name,'') "state", D.id "doc_id" from Doc D left outer join DocStates DSS on D.id=DSS.doc_id and DSS.n=0 left outer join DocState DS on DS.id=DSS.state_id where D.SubConto_id=cast(#{klient_id} as integer) and D.KindDoc_id=12 order by D.Day desc,D.Num desc limit 20

select I.code "code", I.Name "name", cast(GetVSum(R.vprice,R.price, (case when coalesce(D.val_id,0)=978 then 1 else 0 end) ) as numeric(12,2)) "price", R.quant "quant", coalesce(R.quant1,0) "quant1", coalesce(R.Remark,'') "remark", D.KindDoc_id as "KindDoc_id" from Doc D left outer join Doc D1 on D1.id1=D.id and D1.KindDoc_id in (10,16,40) left outer join DocRow R on R.doc_id=coalesce(D1.id,D.id) left outer join Item I on I.id=R.item_id where D.id=cast(#{doc_id} as integer) and R.doc_id is not null

select S.id "klient_id", (select sum(D.Sum-coalesce(D.oSum,0)) from Doc as D join KindDocProperty as P on D.KindDoc_id=P.KindDoc_id and P.Property_id=3 where D.SubConto_id=S.id and D.sDay < current_date + 1 and coalesce(D.opl,0)!=1 and coalesce(D.sum,0)!=0) as "dolgS", (select max(D.id) from Doc D join DocStates DS on DS.doc_id=D.id and DS.state_id in (18) and n=0 where D.KindDoc_id=12 and D.opl=2 and D.SubConto_id=S.id) as "doc_id", A.SubConto_id as "adr" from SubConto S left outer join AdresDeliv A on A.SubConto_id=S.id and A.carrier_id is not null and length(A.phone)>5 and length(A.adres)>10 where lower(S.email)=lower(#{uid}) and lower(S.pwd)=lower(#{pwd}) limit 1

select S.code "code", S.Name "name", sd as "sd", sdE as "sdE", sDolg as "sDolg", sDolgE as "sDolgE", coalesce(K.sumKr,0) "sumKr", coalesce(K.tmKr,0) "tmKr" from SubConto S left outer join SubContoKred K on S.id=K.SubConto_id, ( select cast(sum(case when coalesce(D.val_id,980)=980 then case when DP.Property_id=3 then D.sum-coalesce(D.osum,0) else -D.osum end end) as numeric(12,2)) as sd, cast(sum( case when coalesce(D.val_id,980)=978 then case when DP.Property_id=3 then D.vsum-coalesce(D.vosum,0) else -D.vosum end end) as numeric(12,2)) as sdE,
cast(sum(case when coalesce(D.val_id,980)=980 then case when D.sDay < current_date and DP.Property_id=3 then D.sum-coalesce(D.osum,0) when DP.Property_id is null then -D.osum end end) as numeric(12,2)) as sDolg, cast(sum(case when coalesce(D.val_id,980)=978 then case when D.sDay < current_date and DP.Property_id=3 then D.vsum-coalesce(D.vosum,0) when DP.Property_id is null then -D.vosum end end) as numeric(12,2)) as sDolgE from DocOpen O left outer join Doc D on D.id=O.doc_id left outer join KindDocProperty DP on D.KindDoc_id=DP.KindDoc_id and DP.Property_id=3 where O.SubConto_id=cast( #{klient_id} as integer) ) T where S.id=cast( #{klient_id} as integer)
select AddReqRow2( cast(#{doc_id} as integer), cast(#{item_id} as integer), cast(#{quant} as integer) )

select id as "doc_id" from Doc1 D where base_id=@base_id and KindDoc_id=12 and user_id=-1 and opl=2 and SubConto_id=(select klient_id from Local) and exists(select * from DocStates DS where DS.doc_id=D.id and DS.n=0 and DS.state_id=18) order by id desc limit 1

select I.code "code", I.Name "name", cast(I.pricePro as numeric(12,2)) "price1", GetPrice(I.id) "price", cast(coalesce(R.quant,1) as integer) "quant" from Item I left outer join DocRow1 R on R.doc_id=cast(#{doc_id} as integer) and I.id=R.item_id where I.id=cast(#{item_id} as integer) limit 1

select max(S.SubConto_id) post_id, max(case when P.code=54 then 'Львов' when P.code in (35,56) then coalesce(P.Remark,'Киев доставка +1 день, под заказ, без возврата!') when P.code = 60 then coalesce(P.Remark,'БОШ-5 г.Киев доставка до 5 раб.дней') when P.code = 59 then coalesce(P.Remark,'БОШ-2 г.Киев доставка до 14 раб.дней') else 'Хмельницкий' end) as "placeName", cast( max(I.pricePro) as numeric(12,2)) as "price1", min(case when P.code in (54,35,56,59,60) then 1 else 0 end) as "isSel", case when sum(q)>10 then '>10' else sum(q)||'' end as "q", case when sum(qR)>10 then '>10' else sum(qR)||'' end "qR", case when sum(qI)>10 then '>10' else sum(qI)||'' end "qI" from (select S.SubConto_id, S.inc_id, S.item_id, cast( sum(case when S.kind=1 then S.quant when S.kind=2 then -S.quant end) as numeric(12,2)) as q, cast( sum(case when S.kind=2 then S.quant end) as numeric(12,2)) as qR, cast( sum(case when S.kind=4 then S.quant end) as numeric(12,2)) as qI from Store S where S.kind in (1,2,4) and S.item_id= cast(#{item_id} as integer) and S.SubConto_id in (select place_id from placeSel) group by S.SubConto_id,S.inc_id,S.item_id) S join Place P on S.SubConto_id=P.id left outer join Doc D on S.inc_id=D.id left outer join SubConto Ps on D.SubConto_id1=Ps.id left outer join Item I on S.item_id=I.id group by (case when P.code=54 then 'Львов' when P.code in (35,56) then coalesce(P.Remark,'Киев доставка +1 день, под заказ, без возврата!') when P.code = 60 then coalesce(P.Remark,'БОШ-5 г.Киев доставка до 5 раб.дней') when P.code = 59 then coalesce(P.Remark,'БОШ-2 г.Киев доставка до 14 раб.дней') else 'Хмельницкий' end)

select coalesce((select Value from GlobalVar where name='@mailHost'), 'avtolider-ua.com') as "host", coalesce( (select Value from GlobalVar where name='@mailFrom'), 'AKuzichkin@avtolider-ua.com') as "from", S.Name as "name", S.pwd as "pwd" from SubConto S where S.email=#{email} and S.pwd is not null

select coalesce((select Value from GlobalVar where name='@mailHost'), 'avtolider-ua.com') "host", coalesce((select Value from GlobalVar where name='@mailFrom'), 'AKuzichkin@avtolider-ua.com') as "from" from dual

select mailHost "mailHost", mailFrom||','||K.email as "mailTo", mailFrom as "mailFrom", KD.Name||' № '||D.Num as "docName", K.code "code", K.Name "name", coalesce(D.Remark,'') as "Remark", '
 № пп 	 Код 	 К-во 	 Цена 	 Наименование
' "header", row_number() over(order by R.id)||'	'||I.code||'	'||R.quant||'	'|| cast(GetPrice(R.item_id) as numeric(12,2))||'	'||I.Name as "row", '
			Всего :	'||(select sum(R.quant*GetPrice(R.item_id)) as allSum from DocRow1 R where R.doc_id=D.id) as "footer" from Doc1 D left outer join KindDoc KD on KD.id=D.KindDoc_id left outer join SubConto K on D.SubConto_id=K.id left outer join DocRow1 R on R.doc_id=D.id left outer join Item I on I.id=R.item_id, (select Value as mailHost from GlobalVar where name='@mailHost') MH, (select Value as mailFrom from GlobalVar where name='@mailFrom') MF where D.id=${doc_id} and mailHost>'' and strpos('@',mailFrom)>0 order by R.id

select n, S.code, S.name, S.email, A.Adres, A.Phone, A.contPerson, A.Remark, A.carrier_id, A.typePay_id, to_char( GetCarrierTm(A.carrier_id),'dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm') "dt" from SubConto S left outer join AdresDeliv A on A.SubConto_id=S.id left outer join Carrier C on C.id=A.carrier_id where S.id=cast(#{klient_id} as integer) limit 1
select id "id", Name "name", to_char( GetCarrierTm(id),'dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm') "dt" from Carrier union all select 0,'','' order by 2
select id "id", Name "name" from TypePay union all select 0,'' order by 2
